azurerm_api_management_product_group.description: Manages an API Management Product Assignment to a Group.

product_id.description: The ID of the API Management Product within the API Management Service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

group_name.description: The Name of the API Management Group within the API Management Service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

api_management_name.description: The name of the API Management Service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which the API Management Service exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The ID of the API Management Product Group.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management Product Group.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management Product Group.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management Product Group.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management Product Group.
